original_title: Aimee Betro: US woman jailed for 30 years over failed assassination plot | CNN
article_summary: Aimee Betro, a 45-year-old woman from Wisconsin, has been sentenced to 30 years in a British jail for attempting to kill a man in Birmingham, England. The shooting, which took place in August 2019, was part of a plot recruited by Mohammed Aslam and Mohammed Nazir, who were also jailed for their roles. Betro's gun jammed during the close-range assassination attempt, and she was later found guilty after a two-week trial.</s>
